task.title: Search & Replace Text
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps perform a global search & replace operation.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, select Edit Replace Text... ([Ctrl+F] on Windows/Linux, [Cmd+F] on macOS) or click the Replace Text... button on the top toolbar.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Replace Text Dialog

step.cmd: Enter the text to replace in the Text to Search text box.
Enter the replacement text in the Replace With text box.
Use the Language drop-down to select the language column where the replacement should be performed.
Select the Regular Expression checkbox if you want to use regular expressions for specifying the text to search

taskbody.result: All exact appearances of the text in Text to Search, or fragments that match the given regular expression, are replaced with the text specified in the Replace With text box.
